description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. The exciting, yet smaller by 1 dimension, prequel to Zombie Hunter.  You are given the task of saving as many survivors as possible while defending yourself from the hordes of zombies that have infested the catacombs.  Can you end their zombie terror?  If so, a surprise awaits you at the end...
